subject: Subject: Urgent update required for Order #SSN4832
description_text:
The December 29th shipping deadline has already passed. My order is still
showing as "Unfulfilled," which is very disappointing.

I would like to know the exact status of my shipment—has it actually left
your facility? Please provide the tracking number immediately. I expect a
prompt response regarding this delay.

conversations.body_text: Hi YOUNG HUN KWON,  Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.
ID 号为 9044 和 9529 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9044  
      主题: Shipping Status Inquiry - Order #SSN4832  
      描述:  
 Hello, 
 My order number is #SSN4832, placed on Dec 14th for the HS Pro Shifter.
According to the product page, shipping was scheduled to begin on Dec 19th. 
 However, my order status is still showing as "Unfulfilled" on the website.
Could you please check if my package has already been dispatched?
If so, I would appreciate it if you could provide the tracking number. 
 I am very much looking forward to receiving the product.
Thank you.

合并来自工单9529  
      主题: Subject: Delivery Inquiry - Order #SSN4832  
      描述:  
 It was stated in the latest update that the HS Pro shifter would be shipped on December 29th. However, today is past the 29th, and my order status is still showing as "Unfulfilled." 
 Could you please check the status of my shipment and provide the tracking code immediately?
이 씹새끼들아 29일에 배송한다면서 왜 송장은 없는데?
Hi YOUNG HUN KWON,    We apologize for the delay. Your package has been shipped.  https://www.yuntrack.com/parcelTracking?id=YT2600800704718413
